org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.flogic
Interface FMolecule

All Superinterfaces:
Axiom, Fact, FactFormula, Formula
public interface FMolecule
extends Formula, FactFormula

Represents an F-molecule. Syntactically, an F-molecule can have the form a : b, a :: b, or a[p -> v].

Method Summary

          Returns the OID that this object is instance of.

Method Detail

getModule

Term getModule()
Returns the module of this literal, or null if no module has been supplied.

Returns:
the module of this literal

getObject

Term getObject()
Returns the OID of this F-molecule. In an F-molecule of the form a : b, a :: b, or a[p -> v], this is the object a.

Returns:
the OID of this F-molecule

getInstanceOf

Term getInstanceOf()
Returns the OID that this object is instance of. If this F-molecule is not of the form a : b, thie method returns null.

Returns:
the OID of the class that this object is instance of, or null

getSubClassOf

Term getSubClassOf()
Returns the OID that this object is subclass of. If this F-molecule is not of the form a :: b, thie method returns null.

Returns:
the OID of the class that this object is subclass of, or null

getNumberOfMethodCalls

int getNumberOfMethodCalls()
Returns the number of method calls in this F-molecule.

Returns:
the number of method calls in this F-molecule

getMethodCall

FMethodCall getMethodCall(int methodCallIndex)
Returns the method call with given index.

Parameters:
methodCallIndex - the index of the method call
Returns:
the method call with given index

getMethodCalls

FMethodCall[] getMethodCalls()
Returns the array of method calls. The result array is not owned by this object and can be freely changed.

Returns:
the array of method calls

replaceTerms

FMolecule replaceTerms(Term newModule,
                       Term newObject,
                       Term newInstanceOf,
                       Term newSubClassOf)
Replaces the module, the object term, the instance-of term, and the subclass-of term. This method attemts to be memory efficient by reusing the term arguments.

Parameters:
newModule - the new module
newObject - the new object
newInstanceOf - the new instance of term
newSubClassOf - the new subclass of term
Returns:
the new F-molecule

replaceMethodCalls

FMolecule replaceMethodCalls(FMethodCall[] newMethodCalls)
Replaces the method calls of this molecule.

Parameters:
newMethodCalls - the new method calls (can be null)
Returns:
the new F-molecule
